column4: All: my Delete button got redefined as $xscreensaver-command -lock. It's pretty annoying, anyone know how to undo that?
xmodmap /usr/share/xmodmap/xmodmap.us (if you have a us keyboard) Type that in console
you have a standard keyboard, not some microsoft/logitech thing?
maybe its got some key modification thing that is messing with your delete key.
